main event: On 9 October 1951, several observers reported seeing unidentified flying objects over Paris, Illinois, with descriptions of their appearance and movement.
interesting points: One observer reported a silver, disc-shaped craft approximately 50 to 60 feet in diameter hovering at about 2,000 feet for 15 minutes,Other witnesses noted a fiery object traveling at high speed that stopped abruptly,Weather conditions were clear with no other aircraft present,Reports indicated that the objects emitted no sound or exhaust,The sightings were documented as part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
witness description: two adult males and one adult female, reliable observers with no history of fabrication
